name: Baked Shrimp with Feta Cheese
instructions: Heat oil in skillet over medium heat.
Add oregano, salt, red pepper, shrimp and garlic.
Spoon mix into a 9 x 13 pan coated with PAM.
Add wine to skillet; cook over low heat until reduced to 1/4 c.
Stir in tomato; pour over shrimp.
Sprinkle with cheese and bake for 10 minutes.
Serve mix over pasta and sprinkle with parsley.
